query:
-- First, ensure the chat exists or update its title
        WITH ensure_chat AS (
            INSERT INTO chats (id, title)
            VALUES ($1, $2)
            ON CONFLICT (id) DO UPDATE
            SET title = EXCLUDED.title
        )
        -- Then, insert the image record
        INSERT INTO images (chat_id, message_id, phash)
        VALUES ($1, $3, $4)
